articles.title: ‘Kohli might score a cheap hundred in Zimbabwe but that won’t change things' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former New Zealand all-rounder Scott Styris said it's a 'lose-lose scenario' for Kohli. Styris believes even if Kohli gets a hundred in Zimbabwe it won't change his situation much.
